formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SoftHangup' =-
[Synopsis] Soft Hangup Application
[Description] SoftHangup(Technology/resource|options) Hangs up the requested channel. If there are no channels to hangup, the application will report it. - 'options' may contain the following letter: 'a' : hang up all channels on a specified device instead of a single resource

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,8 +4,8 @@ Soft Hangup Application
[Description] - SoftHangup(Technology/resource|options) + SoftHangup(Technology/resource[,options]): Hangs up the requested channel. If there are no channels to hangup, the application will report it. - - 'options' may contain the following letter: - 'a' : hang up all channels on a specified device instead of a single resource + Options: + 'a' - hang up all channels on a specified device instead of a single resource
